an5.3:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu dittheva dhamme dukkham viharati savighatam saupayasam saparilaham, kayassa ca bheda param marana duggati patikankha.
an5.3:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappi hoti, kusito hoti, duppanno hoti.
an5.3:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu dittheva dhamme dukkham viharati savighatam saupayasam saparilaham, kayassa ca bheda param marana duggati patikankha.
an5.3:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu dittheva dhamme sukham viharati avighatam anupayasam aparilaham, kayassa ca bheda param marana sugati patikankha.
an5.3:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, hirima hoti, ottappi hoti, araddhaviriyo hoti, pannava hoti.
an5.3:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu dittheva dhamme sukham viharati avighatam anupayasam aparilaham, kayassa ca bheda param marana sugati patikankha”ti.
